about.description:
NVIDIA cuTensorNet is a high-performance GPU library for tensor network computations,
a component of the NVIDIA cuQuantum SDK.

The packages cuquantum, custatevec, and cutensornet are governed by the NVIDIA cuQuantum
Software License Agreement (EULA). By downloading and using the packages,
you accept the terms and conditions of the NVIDIA cuQuantum EULA -
https://docs.nvidia.com/cuda/cuquantum/license.html
about.summary: cuTensorNet: A High-Performance Library for Tensor Network Computations

name: cutensornet
raw_recipe:
# This file created by conda-build 3.27.0
# ------------------------------------------------

package:
  name: cutensornet
  version: 2.3.0
source:
  - sha256: 5ff77bd5cf62fab02e598fe5e1b1617d521207552808173e135f9a9607f56bad
    url: https://developer.download.nvidia.com/compute/cuquantum/redist/cuquantum/linux-x86_64/cuquantum-linux-x86_64-23.10.0.6_cuda12-archive.tar.xz
  - sha256: 837d345eb520388c4dfac33fdd1e8b90c001cb751dd90626589870f35ac9b3e0
    url: https://github.com/NVIDIA/cuQuantum/archive/refs/tags/v23.10.0.tar.gz
build:
  ignore_run_exports_from:
    - cuda-nvcc_linux-64 12.0.*
  missing_dso_whitelist: null
  number: 2
  post-link: post-link
  run_exports:
    - cutensornet >=2.3.0,<3.0a0 mpi_openmpi_*
  script:
    - mkdir -p $PREFIX/include
    - mv include/cutensornet* $PREFIX/include/
    - mkdir -p $PREFIX/lib
    - mv lib/libcutensornet.so* $PREFIX/lib/
    - $GCC -shared -std=c11 -fPIC $CFLAGS -I$PREFIX/include distributed_interfaces/cutensornet_distributed_interface_mpi.c
      -L$PREFIX/lib -lmpi -o $PREFIX/lib/libcutensornet_distributed_interface_mpi.so
    - mkdir -p "${PREFIX}/etc/conda/activate.d"
    - cp "${RECIPE_DIR}/cutn-activate.sh" "${PREFIX}/etc/conda/activate.d/cutn-activate.sh"
    - mkdir -p "${PREFIX}/etc/conda/deactivate.d"
    - cp "${RECIPE_DIR}/cutn-deactivate.sh" "${PREFIX}/etc/conda/deactivate.d/cutn-deactivate.sh"
  string: mpi_openmpi_hedba195_2
requirements:
  build:
    - _libgcc_mutex 0.1 conda_forge
    - _openmp_mutex 4.5 2_gnu
    - _sysroot_linux-64_curr_repodata_hack 3 h69a702a_13
    - binutils_impl_linux-64 2.40 hf600244_0
    - binutils_linux-64 2.40 hbdbef99_2
    - cuda-cccl_linux-64 12.0.90 ha770c72_1
    - cuda-cudart 12.0.107 h59595ed_6
    - cuda-cudart-dev 12.0.107 h59595ed_6
    - cuda-cudart-dev_linux-64 12.0.107 h59595ed_6
    - cuda-cudart-static 12.0.107 h59595ed_6
    - cuda-cudart-static_linux-64 12.0.107 h59595ed_6
    - cuda-cudart_linux-64 12.0.107 h59595ed_6
    - cuda-driver-dev_linux-64 12.0.107 h59595ed_6
    - cuda-nvcc-dev_linux-64 12.0.76 ha770c72_1
    - cuda-nvcc-impl 12.0.76 h59595ed_1
    - cuda-nvcc-tools 12.0.76 h59595ed_1
    - cuda-nvcc_linux-64 12.0.76 hba56722_12
    - cuda-version 12.0 hffde075_2
    - gcc_impl_linux-64 12.3.0 he2b93b0_3
    - gcc_linux-64 12.3.0 h76fc315_2
    - gxx_impl_linux-64 12.3.0 he2b93b0_3
    - gxx_linux-64 12.3.0 h8a814eb_2
    - kernel-headers_linux-64 3.10.0 h4a8ded7_13
    - ld_impl_linux-64 2.40 h41732ed_0
    - libgcc-devel_linux-64 12.3.0 h8bca6fd_103
    - libgcc-ng 13.2.0 h807b86a_3
    - libgomp 13.2.0 h807b86a_3
    - libsanitizer 12.3.0 h0f45ef3_3
    - libstdcxx-devel_linux-64 12.3.0 h8bca6fd_103
    - libstdcxx-ng 13.2.0 h7e041cc_3
    - sysroot_linux-64 2.17 h4a8ded7_13
  host:
    - _libgcc_mutex 0.1 conda_forge
    - _openmp_mutex 4.5 2_gnu
    - cuda-nvrtc 12.0.76 h59595ed_1
    - cuda-version 12.0 hffde075_2
    - cutensor 1.7.0.1 h10b603f_3
    - libcublas 12.0.1.189 hcb278e6_2
    - libcusolver 11.4.2.57 hcb278e6_1
    - libgcc-ng 13.2.0 h807b86a_3
    - libgfortran-ng 13.2.0 h69a702a_3
    - libgfortran5 13.2.0 ha4646dd_3
    - libgomp 13.2.0 h807b86a_3
    - libnvjitlink 12.0.76 hcb278e6_1
    - libstdcxx-ng 13.2.0 h7e041cc_3
    - libzlib 1.2.13 hd590300_5
    - mpi 1.0 openmpi
    - openmpi 4.1.6 hc5af2df_101
    - zlib 1.2.13 hd590300_5
  run:
    - __glibc >=2.17,<3.0.a0
    - cuda-version >=12.0,<13.0a0
    - cutensor >=1.7.0.1,<2.0a0
    - libcublas >=12.0.1.189,<13.0a0
    - libcusolver >=11.4.2.57,<12.0a0
    - libgcc-ng >=12
    - libstdcxx-ng >=12
    - openmpi >=4.1.6,<5.0a0
test:
  commands:
    - ./cutn_run_test.sh 23.10.0.6
    - echo $CUTENSORNET_COMM_LIB
    - test -n $CUTENSORNET_COMM_LIB
    - test -f $CUTENSORNET_COMM_LIB
  files:
    - cutn_run_test.sh
    - test_load_elf.c
  requires:
    - cuda-nvcc_linux-64 12.0.*
    - cuda-version 12.0.*
    - gcc_linux-64 12.*
    - git
    - gxx_linux-64 12.*
    - sysroot_linux-64 2.17.*
about:
  description: 'NVIDIA cuTensorNet is a high-performance GPU library for tensor network
    computations,

    a component of the NVIDIA cuQuantum SDK.


    The packages cuquantum, custatevec, and cutensornet are governed by the NVIDIA
    cuQuantum

    Software License Agreement (EULA). By downloading and using the packages,

    you accept the terms and conditions of the NVIDIA cuQuantum EULA -

    https://docs.nvidia.com/cuda/cuquantum/license.html

    '
  dev_url: https://github.com/NVIDIA/cuQuantum
  doc_url: https://docs.nvidia.com/cuda/cuquantum/latest/cutensornet/
  home: https://developer.nvidia.com/cuquantum-sdk
  license: LicenseRef-cuQuantum-Software-License-Agreement
  license_file: LICENSE
  license_url: https://docs.nvidia.com/cuda/cuquantum/latest/license.html
  summary: 'cuTensorNet: A High-Performance Library for Tensor Network Computations'
extra:
  copy_test_source_files: true
  final: true
  flow_run_id: azure_20231117.1.1
  recipe-maintainers:
    - DmitryLyakh
    - JeremyWangNVDA
    - leofang
    - mtjrider
    - yangcal
  remote_url: https://github.com/conda-forge/cuquantum-feedstock
  sha: 199b833ad118a7a7f3dfd925cc1d6df4c76f6ada
